code: import{useCallback}from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import Button from'../button/button.component';import CartItem from'../cart-item/cart-item.component';import{selectCartItems}from'../../store/cart/cart.selector';import{CartDropdownContainer,EmptyMessage,CartItems}from'./cart-dropdown.styles';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CartDropdown=function CartDropdown(){var cartItems=useSelector(selectCartItems);var navigate=useNavigate();var goToCheckoutHandler=useCallback(function(){navigate('/checkout');},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CartDropdownContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItems,{children:cartItems.length?cartItems.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItem,{cartItem:item},item.id);}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmptyMessage,{children:"Your cart is empty"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:goToCheckoutHandler,children:"GO TO CHECKOUT"})]});};export default CartDropdown;
